hero.title: Kwame Brathwaite
hero.subtitle: Founder of the Black is Beautiful movement. Photographer. Cultural icon.

meta.title: Kwame Brathwaite Photo Archive | Black is Beautiful
meta.description: Official archive of legendary photographer Kwame Brathwaite, founder of the Black is Beautiful movement. Explore works, exhibitions, and the legacy of a cultural icon.

meta.title: Works | Kwame Brathwaite Archive
meta.description: Explore the photography archive of Kwame Brathwaite, featuring iconic images from the Black is Beautiful movement, Grandassa Models, and AJASS sessions.

aiRoom.unlockDescription: Enter your email to create AI-generated room scenes for visualizing artwork.
aiRoom.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
aiRoom.privacyNote: We respect your privacy. Your email will only be used for archive updates.
aiRoom.promptPlaceholder: Describe the room you'd like to see this artwork in...
aiRoom.limitReached: Generation limit reached for this session.
aiRoom.error: Failed to generate room. Please try again.
aiRoom.contentPolicy: The prompt couldn't be processed. Try a different description.
aiRoom.dragHint: Drag artwork to reposition on wall. Double-click to reset.

inquiry.success: Thank you for your inquiry. We will respond within 24 hours.
inquiry.error: Unable to submit inquiry. Please try again.

meta.title: Exhibitions | Kwame Brathwaite Archive
meta.description: Discover current, upcoming, and past exhibitions featuring the photography of Kwame Brathwaite at museums and galleries worldwide.

map.noExhibitions: No exhibitions found in this area

reminder.title: Get Reminded
reminder.name: Name
reminder.success: We'll remind you about this exhibition!
reminder.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

meta.title: Press | Kwame Brathwaite Archive
meta.description: Press coverage, reviews, and articles about Kwame Brathwaite's photography and the Black is Beautiful movement.

meta.title: About | Kwame Brathwaite Archive
meta.description: Learn about Kwame Brathwaite, the legendary photographer who founded the Black is Beautiful movement and championed natural African beauty through his work.

meta.title: The Archive | Kwame Brathwaite
meta.description: The official Kwame Brathwaite Archive preserves over 10,000 images documenting 60 years of photography and the Black is Beautiful movement.

contact.title: Contact

meta.title: Contact | Kwame Brathwaite Archive
meta.description: Contact the Kwame Brathwaite Archive for inquiries about artwork purchases, exhibitions, press, and general information.

contact.intro: We welcome inquiries from collectors, museums, educators, and press.
contact.success: Thank you for your inquiry. We will respond within 24 hours.
contact.error: There was an error submitting your inquiry. Please try again.

licensing.title: Image Licensing

meta.title: Image Licensing | Kwame Brathwaite Archive
meta.description: License iconic photographs by Kwame Brathwaite for editorial, commercial, film, educational, and exhibition use.

licensing.subtitle: License iconic photographs by Kwame Brathwaite for your project.

steps.selectDesc: Choose the images you'd like to license from our archive.
steps.chooseDesc: Select the type of license that fits your project.
steps.detailsDesc: Tell us about your project, territory, and intended use.
steps.reviewDesc: Our team will review your request and provide a custom quote.

types.editorialDesc: Books, magazines, newspapers, and editorial publications
types.commercialDesc: Advertising, branding, marketing, and commercial campaigns
types.filmDesc: Films, documentaries, video productions, and streaming content
types.educationalDesc: Textbooks, curricula, classroom materials, and educational institutions
types.exhibitionDesc: Museum displays, gallery exhibitions, and institutional presentations

request.title: Request a License

meta.title: License Request | Kwame Brathwaite Archive
meta.description: Submit a request to license photographs by Kwame Brathwaite for your project.

request.noArtworksSelected: No artworks selected yet. Search and select up to 10 artworks.
request.usageDescriptionPlaceholder: Please describe how you plan to use the images, including the project name, publication, or platform.
request.name: Full Name
request.reviewIntro: Please review your license request before submitting.
request.success: Your license request has been submitted successfully! Your request number is {requestNumber}. We will review your request and respond within 3-5 business days.
request.error: There was an error submitting your request. Please try again.
